duties_responsibilities.duty: Process payroll for 1000+ staff using Workday and ADP Vantage systems.
Maintain timesheet information for US and Puerto Rico staff using Time and Attendance system (Workday).
Transmit and backup payroll files and support department goals using the ADP payroll system.
Create ongoing reports such as run time calculations for new hires each pay period, and quarterly reports for all employees in the HRIS (Workday) system.
Generate Wageworks FSA/DFSA report, monthly headcount report, and Voluntary AD&D Insurance report.

education_certification.credential: Associate’s degree in Accounting or related experience.
